name: 曾德樟
objective:
1. Introduction
2. Fourier theory and communication signals
3. Amplitude modulation
4. Phase and frequency modulation
5. Digital representation of analog signals
6. Baseband transmission of digital signals
schedule:
1. Introduction (1 week)
2. Fourier theory and communication signals (4 weeks)
(1) The Fourier transform
(2) Properties of the Fourier transform
(3) Transmission of signals through linear systems
(4) Correlation and spectral density
3. Amplitude Modulation (3 weeks)
(1) Double Sideband-Large Carrier modulation (DSB-LC)
(2) Double Sideband-Suppressed Carrier modulation (DSB-SC)
(3) Single-Sideband modulation (SSB)
(4) Vestigial Sideband modulation (VSB)
4. Phase and frequency modulation (3 weeks)
(1) Properties of angle-modulated waves
(2) Narrow-band and wide-band frequency modulations
(3) Transmission bandwidth of FM waves
(4) Generation and demodulation of FM signals
5. Digital representation of analog signals (3 weeks)
(1) Sampling theorem
(2) PAM, PDM, and PPM
(3) PCM, delta modulation, and Differential PCM
6. Baseband transmission of digital signals (3 weeks)
(1) Baseband transmission of digital data
(2) The intersymbol interference (ISI) problem
(3) The Nyquist channel and the raised-cosine pulse spectrum
(4) Baseband transmission of M-ary data
scorePolicy:
1. 期中考
2. 期末考
3. 作業
4. 出席率
materials:
